original_text:
There is surely a future hope for you,
    and your hope will not be cut off.
korean_text: 정녕히 네 장래가 있겠고 네 소망이 끊어지지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: There is surely a future hope for you
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히 너를 위한 미래의 소망이 있고

sentences.original_text: and your hope will not be cut off
